PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11692017-09-22,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MONA NEMER, C.M., C.Q., of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Science, to be known as the Chief Science Advisor, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 25, 2017.
